verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <WH7892> Shir, A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <WH4609> ham-Ma-'a-Lot of degrees הַבֹּטְחִ֥ים <WH982> hab-bo-te-Chim They that trust בַּיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; in the LORD כְּֽהַר־ <WH2022> ke-har- [shall be] as mount צִיּ֥וֹן <WH6726> tzi-Yon Zion לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- cannot יִ֝מּ֗וֹט <WH4131> yim-Mot, [which] cannot be removed לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam for ever יֵשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> ye-Shev. [but] abideth

יְֽרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim, Jerusalem הָרִים֮ <WH2022> ha-Rim As the mountains סָבִ֪יב <WH5439> sa-Viv [are] round about לָ֥הּ lah וַ֭יהוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh so the LORD סָבִ֣יב <WH5439> sa-Viv [is] round about לְעַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> le-'am-Mo; his people מֵ֝עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> me-'at-Tah, this וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- from henceforth even for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> o-Lam. ever

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for לֹ֪א <WH3808> lo shall not יָנ֡וּחַ <WH5117> ya-Nu-ach shall not rest שֵׁ֤בֶט <WH7626> She-vet For the rod הָרֶ֗שַׁע <WH7562> ha-Re-sha', of the wicked עַל֮ <WH5921> 'al upon גּוֹרַ֪ל <WH1486> go-Ral upon the lot הַֽצַּדִּ֫יקִ֥ים <WH6662> hatz-tzad-Di-Kim of the righteous לְמַ֡עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an lest לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- will not יִשְׁלְח֖וּ <WH7971> yish-le-Chu put forth הַצַּדִּיקִ֨ים <WH6662> hatz-tzad-di-Kim the righteous בְּעַוְלָ֬תָה <WH5766> be-'av-La-tah unto iniquity יְדֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH3027> ye-dei-Hem. their hands

הֵיטִ֣יבָה <WH2895> hei-Ti-vah Do good יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD לַטּוֹבִ֑ים <WH2896> lat-to-Vim; unto [those that be] good וְ֝לִֽישָׁרִ֗ים <WH3477> ve-li-sha-Rim, and [to them that are] upright בְּלִבּוֹתָֽם׃ <WH3826> be-lib-bo-Tam. in their hearts

וְהַמַּטִּ֤ים <WH5186> ve-ham-mat-Tim As for such as turn aside עַֽקַלְקַלּוֹתָ֗ם <WH6128> a-kal-kal-lo-Tam, unto their crooked ways יוֹלִיכֵ֣ם <WH1980> yo-li-Chem will lead יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with פֹּעֲלֵ֣י <WH6466> po-'a-Lei with the workers הָאָ֑וֶן <WH205> ha-'A-ven; of iniquity שָׁ֝ל֗וֹם <WH7965> Lom, [but] peace עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- be upon יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. [shall be] upon Israel
